content.text:
# Battle of El Caney order of battle

The following units and commanders of the U.S. and Spanish armies fought at the Battle of El Caney during the Spanishâ€“American War on July 1, 1898.
Abbreviations used
Military Rank
* MG = Major General
* BG = Brigadier General
* Col = Colonel
* Ltc = Lieutenant Colonel
* Maj = Major
* Cpt = Captain
* Lt = 1st Lieutenant
Other
* w = wounded
* k = killed
* m = missing
U.S.
Fifth Army Corps
MG William R. Shafter, not present
